description: Consider a 2D sandpile model where each site with 2 or more grains, say at location (x, y), topples and transfers one grain of sand to the sites at locations (x+1, y) and (x, y+1). Let S(n) be the configuration after stabilization of a configuration with n grains at the origin. a(n) = Max_{ (x,y) in S(n) } (x+y).
